function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Supply chains restructuring and nearshoring may lead to smaller headcounts and vulnerable workforces in emerging economies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of domestic supply chain for critical medical supplies like ventilators.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"National self-sufficiency and local manufacturing as a response to global crises.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on global supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on global food supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of pharmaceutical supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Localised manufacturing impacting capacity for medical products","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on imports for vital equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of health protections and economic support for garment workers in asian supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High mobile population and exposure to fly-in fly-out workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining treatment for chronic conditions, such as access to dialysis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lifting of onshore gas exploration moratoria","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of wind and solar from the us covid-19 stimulus package","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Support for coal operations under a major drinking water reservoir in australia","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promotion of private sector models for healthcare in low-and middle-income countries","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privatization of essential natural monopolies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of environmental pollution laws and expansion of fossil fuel extractive industries may lead to increased air and water pollution, contributing to respiratory illnesses and environmental degradation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on domestic manufacturing and shorter supply chains may reconfigure the highly emissions-intensive maritime transportation sector, potentially leading to localized outbreaks of contagious diseases in manufacturing facilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impact of the pandemic on different social groups due to differences in living conditions and access to resources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased mental health issues due to social isolation, post-traumatic stress for health workers, and economic fallout.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed environmental effects of the pandemic, including improvements in air quality and reduction of pollution due to decreased travel, but also potential negative consequences for wildlife and ecological balance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Chronic under-funding of the world health organization who leading to limited resources for global health governance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakening of multilateral institutions, including the who, by influential developed countries.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak public health systems unable to manage population-wide approaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weaknesses and disparities in healthcare systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in public social expenditures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising inequality and falling labor shares of income","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of vulnerabilities caused by neoliberalism","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impact of covid-19 on different social classes, genders, and age groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Divisions in europe exacerbating due to pandemic response differences","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Opposition to mutual co-financing of public expenditures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of demand in the economy due to the covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of irresponsible government policies and decline of industrial sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential repetition of covid-19 type events in the future","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health workers facing physical and mental health risks due to long working hours and shortage of protective equipment.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate burden on women to combine paid work, unpaid domestic work, and home-schooling children.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Escalation of domestic violence during the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Alteration of parenting agreements causing increased family stress and strain on courts during the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased managerial prerogative allowing changes to employees’ duties and work arrangements.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Women in feminised sectors at risk of continued exposure to the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strict health and safety measures in health and social work sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural insensitivity in health response and decision-making","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender inequality and economic impact on women","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor nutrition and inadequate housing infrastructure heighten susceptibility to the pandemic within indigenous communities.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rates of crowding and inadequate access to water in indigenous communities contribute to the difficulty of practicing social distancing and personal hygiene.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of domestic violence due to housing and financial stress within indigenous communities during the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionately high incidence rates of disease among first nations peoples","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
